name: Play me a tune - Red
description:
This harmonica pendant is just the right size to have around your neck. 

The red harmonica is a vintage replica from the early 70's. The harmonica really works!
 
Little trickets have been placed with the harmonica, including a tiny brass vintage locket, a glass red flower and a geometric brass vintage charm.
 
The chain is solid brass and is 78cm. This is a longer style necklace that can easily be thrown over an outfit.
 
_____________________________________________________
 
All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag.
 
However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

The ornate clock hangs from a delicate yet strong solid brass chain, measuring 28 inch / 70 cm. The chain length can be altered upon request.

A 25mm cabochon features a pretty whimsical scene. The pendant sits from a brass bow.
 
The chain is solid brass and is 22 inch in length, plus 2 inch of 
extension chain.
 
___________________________________________________
 
All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag.
 
However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

name: Guradian Angel Watch Over Me
description:
A beautiful Guardian Angel Token.

The pendant features a guardian angel with the raised words 'Guardian Angel Watch Over Me' around the edges. It measures 28mm x 28mm and is solid brass.

The bracelet has been made of natural freshwater pearls, a large gold plated clasp and extension chain.

Bracelet measures 7.5 inches.

______________________________________________________ 

All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag. 

However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

name: Penny Farthing Bicycle
description:
Step back into time with this Penny Farthing Necklace.

The Penny Farthing is a good size, measuring 4.5cm by 5cm. Attached to the Penny Farthing is a glass flower - select your colour below or if you prefer, no flower at all.

The chain is solid brass and is 78cm. 

This is a longer style necklace that can easily be thrown over an outfit.

Was $20 now $15
 
______________________________________________________ 

All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag. 

However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

name: Antique Scroll
description:
Beautiful antique filigree style earrings. 

The leaf pendants measure 61 x 47mm and are perfect for that pair of bigger earrings.
 
A variety of materials, including a sealer, have been used to achieve the faux patina look.
 
Sterling silver earring hooks. 


___________________________________________________ 

All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag. 

However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

name: Mad Hatter
description:
The Mad Hatter: Have I gone mad? 
[Alice checks Hatter's temperature] 
Alice Kingsley: I'm afraid so. You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best people are.
 
I just love the Mad Hatter!

The little glass bottle hangs on a good quality solid brass chain. 

The bottle measures 35mm and the width across the base 15mm. 

Chain measures 75 cm in length.

___________________________________________________

All Mecino jewellery is posted in an organza bag and recycled floral paper bag.

However, if you require this product to be posted with a gift box - please click on 'Gift Box - Box and extra postage' (additional postage costs required)

name: Box and extra postage
description:
A recycled craft gift box. Jewellery will be placed on white cotton watting, gift boxed with Mecino tags, all enclosed in a pretty floral paper bag.

Please note that if you were to add 'Box and extra postage' to your order, all pieces will be gift boxed at a flat rate of $5, no matter how many pieces you order.

The additional charges are for postage only.
